# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String; text_width::Int = 10)
    lines = split(text, " ")
    wrapped_lines = Vector{String}()

    for word in lines
        if length(word) + sum(length.(wrapped_lines)) > text_width
            push!(wrapped_lines, "")
        end
        push!(wrapped_lines, word)
    end

    return join(wrapped_lines, "\n")
end

# Example usage:
text = "Hello there this is a very long string that should be wrapped at 10 characters per line."
wrapped_text = wrap_string(text)
println(wrapped_text)
```
